formulas.name: EraliestPaymentExpiry_VP_FP
formulas.expression: IF( AND( ISBLANK({!$Record.Requested_Date__c}), ISBLANK({!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}) ), NULL, IF( ISBLANK({!$Record.Requested_Date__c}), {!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}, IF( ISBLANK({!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}), {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}, IF( {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}+65 < {!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}+90, {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}+65, {!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}+90 ) ) ) )

formulas.name: EraliestPaymentExpiry_WFG_ITB
formulas.expression: IF( AND( ISBLANK({!$Record.Requested_Date__c}), ISBLANK({!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}) ), NULL, IF( ISBLANK({!$Record.Requested_Date__c}), {!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}, IF( ISBLANK({!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}), {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}, IF( {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}+35 < {!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}+90, {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}+35, {!$Record.Case__r.Property_Valuation_Date__c}+90 ) ) ) )

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgEarlyFinalPaymentAllocation
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Payment processed

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant_FirstName__c}

A payment request made against the property {!$Record.Property__r.Property_Address__c} has been processed. The process for discharging the mortgage is under way.
 

Payment details
 
Payment ID {!$Record.Name}
Requested date {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}
Payment Status {!$Record.Status__c}

   View payment record      


What's next?

We will inform you as soon as the mortgage is discharged.

sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgITEPaymentReminderToPF
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Payment required

Dear {!$Record.Case__r.Property__r.Panel_Financier_Name__r.Name}

A case for {!$Record.Case__r.Type} was processed for the property {!$Record.Property_Address__c} and we wish to remind you that you are required to make a payment by {!$Record.Expiry_Date_With_5_Day_Buffer__c}.


Payment details
 
Payment ID {!$Record.Name}
BPAY Biller code {!$Record.Biller_Code__c}
BPAY iCRN {!$Record.iCRN__c}
Payment amount {!PaymentAmount}
Payment comments {!$Record.Comments__c}
Requested date {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}
Linked request ID {!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}


How can I pay?

You can pay using BPAY.

sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgPaymentReminder
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund
Payment required - reminder

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant__r.FirstName}

A case for {!$Record.Case__r.Type} was processed for the property {!$Record.Property__r.Property_Address__c} and we wish to remind you that you are required to make a payment by {!ExpiryDateLess5Days}.
 

Payment details
 
Payment ID {!$Record.Name}
Payment amount {!PaymentAmount}
Payment comments {!$Record.Comments__c}
Requested date {!RequestedDateFormatted}
Linked request ID {!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}


HOW CAN I PAY?

Log onto the Victorian Homebuyer Fund portal and follow the prompts to make a payment.

You can pay using BPAY, PayPal, Visa or Mastercard. Note: A surcharge may apply depending on the payment method you use, which will be calculated at the payment stage.

Protecting yourself online
You will never receive an email from us asking for sensitive information like your password, username or credit card information. If you do receive a message like that, never reply and instead let the Homebuyer Fund team know about it at security@sro.vic.gov.au

sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.description: A notification sent to Primary Participant based on the Case Type of the Payment.
textTemplates.name: EmailMsgPaymentRequiredCaseType
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund
Payment required

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant__r.FirstName}

A case for {!$Record.Case__r.Type} was processed for the property {!$Record.Property__r.Property_Address__c} and you are required to make a payment by {!ExpiryDateLess5Days}.

As part of the request processing, a valuation may have been conducted on your property to determine the value of the State's remaining equity in your property. You can see the result of the most recent valuation in the Victorian Homebuyer Fund portal, as well as the number of free valuations remaining.
 

Payment details
 
Payment ID {!$Record.Name}
Payment amount {!PaymentAmount}
Payment comments {!$Record.Comments__c}
Requested date {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}
Linked request ID {!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}
HOW CAN I PAY?

Log onto the Victorian Homebuyer Fund portal and follow the prompts to make a payment.
You can pay using BPAY, PayPal, Visa or Mastercard. Note: A surcharge may apply depending on the payment method you use, which will be calculated at the payment stage.

Protecting yourself online
You will never receive an email from us asking for sensitive information like your password, username or credit card information. If you do receive a message like that, never reply and instead let the Homebuyer Fund team know about it at security@sro.vic.gov.au
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgVPWithRefinanceParticipantNotification
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Payment required by lender

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant__r.FirstName}

A case for {!$Record.Case__r.Type} was processed for the property {!$Record.Property_Address__c} and a payment request has been sent to {!$Record.Property__r.Panel_Financier_Name__r.Name} to make a payment by {!$Record.Expiry_Date_With_5_Day_Buffer__c}.

This email is for your information only and there is no action required by you.


Payment details
 
Payment ID {!$Record.Name}
Payment amount {!PaymentAmount}
Payment comments {!$Record.Comments__c}
Requested date {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}
Linked request ID {!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}


What's next?

You will be notified when the payment is received and allocated to the property.

sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgVPWithRefinanceParticipantReminderNotification
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Payment required

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant__r.FirstName}

A case for {!$Record.Case__r.Type} was processed for the property {!$Record.Property_Address__c} and a payment request was sent to {!$Record.Case__r.Property__r.Panel_Financier_Name__r.Name} to make a payment by {!$Record.Expiry_Date_With_5_Day_Buffer__c}.
This is to inform you that the payment has not been received yet from your lender.


Payment details
 
Payment ID {!$Record.Name}
Payment amount {!PaymentAmount}
Payment comments {!$Record.Comments__c}
Requested date {!$Record.Requested_Date__c}
Linked request ID {!$Record.Case__r.CaseNumber}

   View request      


What's next?

You will be notified when the payment is received and allocated to the property.

sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia
